name: The Library (ell_aitch)
description:
You are an apprentice librarian in a University Library in the early 1900s, a respectable job and a quiet life. 

One day, a mysterious gentleman visits, wanting to find an obscure volume kept in the library's collection.  Your search in the depths of the library's archives will take you on a terrifying journey from which there is no coming back.

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Interact: Touch highlighted objects

Pick up objects: Walk over

A short horror game, inspired by the ghost stories of English writer M. R. James.

Created by Ell_Aitch / Music and cover art by @MrWilliamHealy
